intro: The world has gone mad, it's time to unleash chaos! Super World War is a turn based strategy game for up to 4 players.
description:
The President of the World, Theorn BrunceWald, is dead, leaving the seat he held for years up for grabs. Now’s the perfect time for the other world leaders to make their move for global domination—and so begins the Super World War!


CRUSH YOUR ENEMIES

Collect hexacoins to raise your army and win the war! Build a force that bends the terrain to your advantage and destroy your enemies in a glorious, over-the-top bloodbath!


A MADCAP STORY

Play as each of the 6 leaders in Story Mode, featuring 40 explosive missions. Command your armie and set out to conquer the world; whether it’s to make your father proud, bring peace and stability, embrace total madness, or just because you’re bored out of your mind.


SUPERPOWERFUL SUPER WEAPONS

When your units just aren’t enough, call in your Leader! Each one comes with a unique Super Weapon capable of completely turning the tide of battle.


NO CALM BEFORE THE STORM

The weather changes throughout the battle and only the smartest strategists know how to turn it to their advantage. Hide your troops in the fog, march across frozen rivers, and catch your enemies completely off guard!


MULTIPLAYER

Challenge your friends in local or online multiplayer battles for up to 4 players across 80+ maps! Free-for-all or team up, pick your leader and prove once and for all that you should be the next President of the World!
